One of my favorite dating sims yet the love ark between felix and freddy is one of the best story arks i have ever played through, the buildup to their grand sex scene had me at the edge of my chair for hours will they do it will they not it was captivating. 10/10 I i love this game if you like realistic dating sims this is for sure the game you should get
Muito bom, adorei jogar com os amigos
It's a love/hate relationship with this game but over all pretty fun to play.
对新手并不友好，玩了42个小时，仍然会炸鸡秒倒，但是喜欢这种游戏的确实可以玩，挺好玩的。。。最后建议先看主播玩再判断

Is your game stuck on Initialization Completed screen like it was for me? Clear your Steam download cache, this fixed it for me.

Overall a well-rounded and exciting gaming experience; there are bugs at times, but it is a living game in that the developers update it frequently, even adding new content into its rather long life, by gaming standards.

Você se estressa um pouco no início e alguns assassinos pagos são quase impossíveis de jogar contra mas você vai se divertir com os amigos quando aprender o básico sobre jogar como sobrevivente ou killer. Recomendo jogar com os amigos.
this game can be fun at times :)
Tudo, eh lindo. Bjos de luz aos devs.

i like the game but there are so many bugs in the game that need to be fixed.
i've been playing for around 4 years and one time i lost all my progress after an error.. they fixed the bug but it was really annoying.

i like how they updated the game and there are more killers and also the trailers look wayyy better. i do think that they spend more time on the killers than survivors.

It's a game. I know, big surprise. I've wasted my life away grinding away at this game and I don't regret a single second of it. The games fun, apart from its "features" or better known as bugs. It has a pretty entitled community as well. Overall, a solid game.

My response to this game is the same it would be for any good horror movie. There will always be room for improvement and polish. I would love to see what else the developers can come up with, and I hope this game is around for a very long time.

One of my all time favorite games, I recommend people to buying this. I've been playing this for like 5 years now. I started on PS4, then Xbox, and now I just switched to PC. I also played a bit of mobile to.

Хорошая, но быстро надоела. 
В целом довольно забавная игра для ко-опа. С друзьями побегать от маньяка самое то. И хоть больше чем на 13 часов она меня не затянула, но если найти постоянную компанию для игры то она подарит вам много эмоций. Нет, она не страшная. Но довольно интересная. (хоть и в первое время).
Я не буду углубляться в тему доната и кое какого дисбаланса, но такая 'штука' тут присутствует. 
Прокачка персонажа тут кстати довольно интересная. Большое количество карт. Куча маньяков. 
В целом к покупке рекомендую, но только с компанией и по скидке.
I hate this game so much but at the end of the day I can't walk away.
buen genplay al jugar como sobreviviente o asesino, balanceados los asesinos y los sobrevivientes muy dinámico el juego con cada asesino o sobreviviente y mapa
Fun with friends and alone, one of my go to games.
Everything about this game frustrates the hell out of me but I keep playing it so I guess that means it's good.

СУКА ЄТО БЛЯТСКИЙ КИМ ЧЕН ЫН СТРЕЛЯЕТ СВОИМИ НОЖАМИ КАК БЛЯТСКИМИ ЯДЕРНЫМИ РАКЕТАМИ, НЕТ БЛЯТЬ ИДИ ПОЙ СВОЙ КЕЙПОП ДЛЯ БЛЯТСКИХ СЕМИКЛАСНИЦ ИБО ДЕД ТАК ОХУЕЛ ЧТО У НЕГО ЧАСЫ ДАЖЕ НЕРАБОТАЮТ, ТАК ЭТОНЕ ВСЕ ЕГО БЛЯТСКИЙ ФАНАТИЗМ КАК ЕБУЧИЙ ВОЕНКОМАТ СТОИШ ГДЕТО БЛЯТЬ ПОД КОМЧАТКОЙ А Я ОТ НЕГО ФАНАТЕЮ И ЕБАШУСЬ ГОЛОВОЙ ОБ ЕГО СВЕТЯШИЙСЯ ДИЛДОН, Я ДУМАЮ НО ПОХУЙ СЕБУСЬ, ТАК ОН СУКА ДВЕРИ КАК МАМКА ЗАКРЫВАЕТ ЧТОБЫ Я  С ПОСОНАМИ ПО ПИВКУ НЕ СМОГ ПОПИТЬ, ИДИ БЛЯТЬ ВСВОЮ КОРЕЮ ИБО Я НАЙДУ ТЕБЯ И ВЫЕБУ ТВОЙ ЯТСКИЙ ЗАД
fun game, but the matchmaking is whack and the hitboxes are really questionable. really fun with friends tho
its a nice and funny game

Pros:
1) Great game to play with friends.
2) Huge replay value.
3) Killers from fav movie/games.
4) Addictive gameplay.
5) Runs on low spec PC.
Cons:
1) The grind is massive and lot of stuff is behind DLC paywall if you want to progress faster.(Devs think this is not a issue btw)
2) Most people use same meta build(which is Necessary to win in most cases).
3) Shit community full of toxic people.
4) Bugs in game or game in bugs am not sure.
5) Not beginner friendly.
Nettes Coop Game hat seine Makel aber macht mega bock für Geile Speile-Abende mit Freunden.
